duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing the Sales Relationship with the assigned account base, locating new distribution opportunities, and strategically executing the Sales and Service Cycle accordingly.
Planning, setting up, expanding, and maintaining product assortment in retail distribution.
Merchandising, retail and digital asset delivery, and implementation.
Promotional and Event planning, pre-planning, scheduling, and budgeting.
Retail in-person and digital training, spiff, and loyalty program execution.
Forecasting and demand planning, including identifying and communicating issues that lead to assortment retractions and additions.
Gathering field call intel and communicating retail landscape, trends, and competitive intel. Providing product development counsel and identifying market opportunities.
Participating in shooting sport trade shows, consumer events, regional shooting events, and regional retail events.
Building, maintaining, and executing a comprehensive territory plan, setting clear and measurable business goals, and identifying account challenges and proposing relevant solutions.
Assisting internal A/R to ensure timely payment for accounts and identifying, growing, maximizing, and maintaining quality stocking dealer accounts for repeat business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree strongly preferred. In lieu of degree, 10+ years of relevant experience may suffice.
